title: Total synthesis of naturally occurring abietane diterpenoids via a late-stage Fe(III)-bTAML catalysed Csp3–H functionalization
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20420-20424
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03791J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mintu Munda, Debasmita Chatterjee, Moumita Majhi, Souvik Biswas, Debopam Pal, Alakesh Bisai
A site-selective C–H functionalization strategy has been developed for a concise total synthesis of angustanol (5), majusanin B (2), majusanic acid D (1), angustanoic acid F (4), angustanoic acid E (6) and angustanoic acid G (3).
